root.Summary: 1: Boles RG, Hornung HA, Moody AE, Ortiz TB, Wong SA, Eggington JM, Stanley CM,Gao M, Zhou H, McLaughlin S, Zare AS, Sheldon KM, Skolnick J, McKernan KJ. Hurt, tired and queasy: Specific variants in the ATPase domain of the TRAP1mitochondrial chaperone are associated with common, chronic "functional"symptomatology including pain, fatigue and gastrointestinal dysmotility.Mitochondrion. 2015 Jul;23:64-70. doi: 10.1016/j.mito.2015.05.002. Epub 2015 May 27. PubMed PMID: 26022780; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4586064.
